channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Extremely icy pavement, 7th January
item.description:
Public pavement outside Angel Oak Academy on the main walking route used by pupils is untreated, icy and hazardous. A child has been injured.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Burcher Gale Grove, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poorly parked van, 7th January
item.description:
This van has not moved for three weeks and is in disrepair. It appears to have been abandoned.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Road, London

item.title: Ice Buildup, 7th January
item.description:
After sub-zero temperatures followed by rain, there's a gigantic ice patch on the corner of Martello Street and London Lane on the C27 Cycle Route. This is a recurring problem in this spot with these weather conditions/after heavy rain in winter.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Martello Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Mouldy Vehicle, 7th January
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Westcombe Park Road, Blackheath

item.title: Junction with Burghley Road, 7th January
item.description:
Report of Very slippery ice on Lady Somerset Road junction with Burghley Road including the pavements. Members of the public are falling, vehicles are sliding, the area requires to be gritted asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Lady Somerset Road, Tufnell Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
